- CIVILIAN UNREST qivihg TO PRIM. RESTRICTIONS.

(Circulated at the request of Lord Miner).
X X X X X
There is a large and growing volume of unrest among the oivilian population whioh the Lioenoe Holders v/ho come into personal oontact with the people find it most difficult to deal with, and which it seems to my Executive oan only be appeased by a reconsideration of the minimum amount of 10,000,000 standard barrels provided for by the reoent Order of the Pood Controller.
x x x x x
27 Russell Square, -7,0.. 7th June 1917.
